name: Data
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Data
description:
Data

Represents a row in a result from Cloud Spanner. Provides access to data in a hash-like structure. Values can be retrieved by name (String), or in cases in which values are unnamed, by zero-based index position (Integer).

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

db = spanner.client "my-instance", "my-database"

results = db.execute "SELECT * FROM users"

results.rows.each do |row|
  puts "User #{row[:id]} is #{row[:name]}"
end

methods.name: fields
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Data#fields
methods.description: Returns the names and values of the data as an array of field objects.

returns.description: An array containing name and value pairs.

methods.name: types
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Data#types
methods.description:
Returns the types of the data.

See Data types.

returns.description: An array containing the types of the values.

methods.name: keys
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Data#keys
methods.description: Returns the names of values, or in cases in which values are unnamed, the zero-based index position of values.

returns.description:
An array containing the names
(String) or position (Integer) for the corresponding values of the
data.

methods.name: pairs
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Data#pairs
methods.description: Returns the names or positions and their corresponding values as an array of arrays.

returns.description:
An array containing name/position and value
pairs.

title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Data#[]
methods.description: Returns the value object for the provided name (String) or index (Integer). Do not pass a name to this method if the data has more than one member with the same name.

params.name: key
params.description:
The name (String) or zero-based index
position (Integer) of the value.

exceptions.description:
if the data
contains duplicate names.

returns.description: The value, or nil if no value is found.
An array containing the values of the data.

methods.name: to_h
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Data#to_h
methods.description: Returns the names or indexes and corresponding values of the data as a hash. Do not use this method if the data has more than one member with the same name.

exceptions.description:
if the data
contains duplicate names.

returns.description:
A hash containing the names
or indexes and corresponding values.
